title: Update: He Was Ghosted By His Girlfriend Of Three Years?!
description:
Bert never believed someone could be blindsided by a breakup until it happened to his friend. Three months ago, his friend moved in with his girlfriend. Things were going great, and he was planning on proposing.
That was until she sent him a text saying she can't date him anymore. He hasn't heard anything from her since. So what could be the reason for this random message?
